title: Australian Ex-PM Malcolm Turnbull hasn’t made any comments about Modi’s victory in the 2019 elections
subtitle: Malcolm Turnbull has never made such comments either during any of his visits to India or on any social media platforms.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
Many Facebook users are sharing a post alleging that Australian ex-Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull has said that if Narendra Modi wins 2019 elections, India would become a developed nation by 2024. Let’s try to analyze the veracity of the comments put in the FB post.

Claim 1: Malcolm Turnbull has said that if Narendra Modi wins 2019 elections, India will become a developed nation by 2024. Fact: Malcolm Turnbull has never made such comments either during any of his visits to India or on any social media platforms. Hence, the claim is FALSE.

When Twitter Advanced Search was conducted to check if any such comments were made by Turnbull, no relevant tweet was found. There are also no statements made by Turnbull about Modi’s win in 2019 during any of his visits to India and no such news found anywhere.

Finally, Australian Ex-PM Malcolm Turnbull hasn’t made any comments about Modi’s victory in the 2019 elections.
